data.headline: Aspiring Backend Engineer with a Passion for Problem-Solving
data.summary: As a self-taught developer, I have a strong foundation in backend engineering principles and a keen interest in building scalable and efficient applications. With a focus on continuous learning, I'm eager to apply my skills and contribute to innovative projects that make a real impact.

experience.title: Junior Backend Developer
bullets: Developed and maintained RESTful APIs using Django and Django REST Framework
Implemented efficient database models and optimized database queries
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to understand requirements and deliver solutions
Participated in code reviews and mentored junior developers

projects.name: Personal Blog
projects.description: Developed a personal blog using Django, SQLite, and Bootstrap. Implemented features like user authentication, CRUD operations, and responsive design.

data.photo_prompt: Professional LinkedIn-style headshot. Friendly, confident expression. Neutral background.
